Group bookings

When it’s time to organise your birthday dinner, a big family lunch or a meal with your business partners, a group booking is the perfect way to simplify ordering while still getting the most out our Chef’s repertoire. .

Plan your next celebration with us at Omnia Bistro. We’re here to talk about dietary specifics and little extras to make your experience memorable. Parties of seven or more are invited to enjoy our curated set menu featuring our seasonally sourced dishes, and timeless classics.

If you are visiting us as a party of seven or more, please get in touch with our reservations team at info@omniabistro.com.au or (03) 8080 8080 between 9pm and 5pm, Tuesday to Saturday.
